Resistance.help: Body armor gives Soldiers resistance to Lethal and Smashing Damage. Their training makes them resistant to Confuse and Placate. He has a Sub Machine Gun Burst, and has a Med Kit to heal allies.

Med_Kit.help: Heals a single targeted ally. This power is interruptible, so you shouldn't use this in combat.

messages.attackerHit: {PlayerSource} heals {PlayerDest} for {Damage} points of health with their {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points of health with their {PowerName}.

SMG_Burst.help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Submachine Gun.
SMG_Burst.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the Submachine Gun.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

SMG_Heavy_Burst.help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Submachine Gun.
SMG_Heavy_Burst.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the Submachine Gun.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Equip.help: This Medic has been Equipped. He can now fire a Heavy Burst.

Stimulant.help: Frees an ally from any Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Fear or Confuse effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a brief time. Protection will improve with Multiple applications and as you advance in level. This power is interruptible and shouldn't be used in the heat of combat.
Stimulant.shortHelp: Close, Ally Res(Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Sleep, Fear, Confuse)
Stimulant.targetHelp: The Stimulant provides some resistance to Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Fear or Confuse effects.
Stimulant.targetShortHelp: Res(Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Sleep, Fear, Confuse)
Stimulant.attackerHit: {PlayerSource} uses their {PowerName} to protect {PlayerDest} from Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Fear or Confuse effects.
Stimulant.victimHit: {PlayerSource} protects you from IImmobilization, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Fear or Confuse effects with a Stimulant.

Frag_Grenade.help: This explosion from this Fragmentation Grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back.
Frag_Grenade.targetHelp: This explosion from this Fragmentation Grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Tactical_Upgrade.help: This Medic has been Tactically Upgraded. He now has a Hand Grenade and can use a Stimulant on Allies to protect them from control effects.
